## Chess.deleteComment() method

Delete and return the comment for a position, if it exists.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteComment(fen?: string): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fen | string | Defaults to the current position |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined

## Example


```js
const chess = new Chess()

chess.loadPgn("1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 {giuoco piano} *")

chess.getComment()
// -> "giuoco piano"

chess.deleteComments()
// -> "giuoco piano"

chess.getComment()
// -> undefined

```
